groups.page_description: At the UW, there a limited amount of groups that are serving asylee and refugee communities. You can make a difference by starting or joining a short-term service group with your peers!

groups.instructions: Click on 'View More' to find out the details of the group. If you have inspiration for your own event, create a group! If you are looking for inspiration, see our ORGs page to learn about Seattle organizations.
